                        {
                              $Changed = false;
                              
                              return( 
                                    $this->JQueryMarkup->process_string( 
                                          $Options , 
                                          '{tab_control:id='.$Options->get_setting( 
                                                'id' , $Options->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) ) ).'}' , 
                                          $Changed
                                    )
                              );
                        }
                        
                        if( $Options->get_setting( 'add_tab' , '0' ) == '1' )
                        {
                              $Changed = false;
                              
                              return(
                                    $this->JQueryMarkup->process_string( 
                                          $Options , 
                                          '{add_tab:id='.$Options->get_setting( 'id' ).';content_id='.
                                                $Options->get_setting( 'content_id' ).';title='.
                                                $Options->get_setting( 'title' , 'title' ).';index='.
                                                $Options->get_setting( 'index' , -1 ).'}' , 
                                          $Changed
                                    )
                              );
                        }
                        
                        if( $Options->get_setting( 'add_iframe_tab' , '0' ) == '1' )
                        {
                              $Changed = false;
                              
                              return(
                                    $this->JQueryMarkup->process_string( 
                                          $Options , 
                                          '{add_iframe_tab:id='.$Options->get_setting( 'id' ).';url='.

                                                $Options->get_setting( 'title' , 'title' ).';index='.
                                                $Options->get_setting( 'index' , -1 ).'}' , 
                                          $Changed
                                    )
                              );
                        }
                        return( '' );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
